displayProperties.name: Shocked Glyphkeeper
displayProperties.description: Damaging a Glyphkeeper with a grenade causes your equipped Pulse Rifles, Sidearms, Machine Guns, and Submachine Guns to deal additional damage.

displayProperties.name: Sleight of Hand
displayProperties.description: Final blows with weapons or abilities while this weapon is stowed increase its handling, stability, and reload speed for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Umbral Hastening
displayProperties.description: While you have several stacks of Pervading Darkness, you gain increased mobility.

displayProperties.name: Umbral Sharpening
displayProperties.description: While you have several stacks of Pervading Darkness, you deal increased weapon damage.

displayProperties.name: Smoldering Glyphkeeper
displayProperties.description: Damaging a Glyphkeeper with a grenade causes your equipped Hand Cannons, Shotguns, Grenade Launchers, and Rocket Launchers to deal additional damage.

displayProperties.name: Distorted Glyphkeeper
displayProperties.description: Damaging a Glyphkeeper with a grenade causes your equipped Auto Rifles, Linear Fusion Rifles, Scout Rifles, and Sniper Rifles to deal additional damage.

displayProperties.name: Umbral Recharge
displayProperties.description: While you have several stacks of Pervading Darkness, your class ability recharges quicker.

displayProperties.name: Into the Light
displayProperties.description: Your grenades recharge quicker and deal more damage when you are not under the effects of Pervading Darkness.

displayProperties.name: Stagnant Glyphkeeper
displayProperties.description: Damaging a Glyphkeeper with a grenade causes your equipped Bows, Fusion Rifles, Swords, and Trace Rifles to deal additional damage.

displayProperties.name: Bait and Switch
displayProperties.description: Deal damage with all equipped weapons within a short time to give this weapon a damage boost.

displayProperties.name: Sleight of Hand
displayProperties.description: Final blows with weapons or abilities while this weapon is stowed increase its handling, stability, and reload speed for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Siphoned Glyphkeeper
displayProperties.description: Killing a Glyphkeeper grants some grenade, class, and Super energy.

displayProperties.name: Souldrinker
displayProperties.description: Gain health based on the number of hits before reloading.

displayProperties.name: Bait and Switch
displayProperties.description: Deal damage with all equipped weapons within a short time to give this weapon a damage boost for an improved duration.
